column5: Any of you folks up there in the summer----Pipestone River and other areas?????
I have been up that way years ago, menako, horseshoe and windigo were all very good.
Been up there several times. Hope to be up there again in June with Wheres Waldo!!
Good crappie fishing up that way
We did a moose hunt on this lake a few years ago. Walleye fishing was good at that time of the year
Great area up there--a long drive from central Michigan, but worth it..................

Been there, done that with an epic trip 7 years ago with my 2 daughters. One had been doing trips with me for many years, it was the first trip for the other since she (supposedly) didn't enjoy fishing. She hasn't missed a year since and even chose her graduate school this year based on being able to go on our annual Canada trip. Out of 50+ trips north that one will be the one I always remember the most.
